Control Name: Assesses Opportunities—The assessment of fraud risk considers opportunities for unauthorized acquisition, use, or disposal of assets, altering the entity’s reporting records, or committing other inappropriate acts.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Opportunities—The assessment of fraud risk considers opportunities for unauthorized acquisition, use, or disposal of assets, altering the entity’s reporting records, or committing other inappropriate acts.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.3 COSO Principle 8: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks to the achievement of objectives
